name: keejkrej
description: Biology research toolkit - microscopy analysis and structure prediction

plugins.name: biology-microscopy
plugins.description: Microscopy data analysis toolkit with bioio. Read metadata, validate files, and analyze microscopy images (OME-TIFF, ND2, CZI, etc.).

plugins.name: biology-structure
plugins.description: Biomolecular structure prediction using Boltz-2. Predict 3D structures of proteins, DNA, RNA, and ligand complexes via NVIDIA NIM API or local GPU.
